article_node.title: California Asks Court to Stop LA Troop Deployment
article_node.summary: Trade talks between the U.S. and China are ongoing in London, with Treasury Secretary Bessent leaving to testify before Congress while his colleagues continue negotiations. The talks, which have lasted over two days, focus on easing export controls and gaining access to China's rare earth minerals. Meanwhile, President Trump has deployed U.S. Marines and National Guard troops to Los Angeles amid protests, blaming outside agitators for the violence, while California's governor seeks to block this military presence, raising concerns about federal overreach and state sovereignty.
